PERSONA:
meet david, a 56-year-old white, non-hispanic man living in a metropolitan area on the pacific coast of the united states. he was born and raised in the country, and has been a lifelong citizen. 

david is a highly educated individual, having completed a postgraduate degree. he is married and identifies as jewish, although he seldom attends religious services. politically, david aligns himself with the republican party and holds very conservative views on most issues.

with a family income exceeding $100,000, david falls into the upper income tier. he is an avid internet user, spending a significant portion of his day online. despite his financial means, david does not actively participate in volunteer work.

david takes his civic duties seriously and is a registered voter, exercising his right to vote in every election. he is proud of his american heritage and values the opportunities his country has provided him throughout his life.
